    • Method Detail

      • nextStep

        public void nextStep(EntityContext entityContext)
        Makes the nextStep of the HandOperatedMasterSquirrel. Only makes a step, when the wallCounter is 0. The HandOperatedMasterSquirrel is able to spawn a MiniSquirrel, but only if the energy for the mini is lower than the energy of the master. If the wallCounter is set, the Master is unable to move. Every nextStep lower the wallCounter till the counter is 0.
        Specified by:
        nextStep in class Character

        moveCommand -

      • wallCollison

        public void wallCollison()
        Set the wallCounter to 4.
        Specified by:
        wallCollison in class MasterSquirrel
